com.adobe.cq.commerce.api

Interface ProductRelationship

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultProductRelationship

    @ProviderType
public interface ProductRelationship
    A ProductRelationship provides information about a relationship between some context (shopper, cart, page and/or product) and a product.

    Additional metadata regarding either the relationship or the product can also be included. See ProductRelationshipsProvider for further details.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueMap getMetadata() 
      Product getProduct() 
      java.lang.String getRelationshipTitle() 
      java.lang.String getRelationshipType() 

    • Method Detail

      • getRelationshipType

        java.lang.String getRelationshipType()
        Returns:
        a string token identifying the relationship type (cross-sell, warranty, best-seller, trending-product, etc.)

      • getRelationshipTitle

        java.lang.String getRelationshipTitle()
        Returns:
        a string identifying the relationship type to an author

      • getProduct

        Product getProduct()
        Returns:
        the related product

      • getMetadata

        ValueMap getMetadata()
        Returns:
        a read-/write-able collection of metadata regarding the product and/or relationship
